paradigm.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a model or example that shows how something works or is produced
paradigm.translation[0].definitions[0].e: the basic paradigm of the family tree
paradigm.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a very clear or typical example of something
paradigm.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Pius XII remained the paradigm of what a pope should be.
paradigm.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a good example of how a product, system etc can work or be produced
paradigm.translation[1].definitions[0].e: J.J.'s success in building Tylenol into a best-seller has become a paradigm of consumer drug marketing.
